title: This Man Died A Week After Being Discharged From Hospital To His Care Home. His Family Later Found Out He Had Coronavirus.
description: Arthur Whitby’s son told BuzzFeed News he feared his dad was just one of many elderly people who have returned to care homes without being tested for the virus. View Entire Post ›
content: Whitbys son John, 73, told BuzzFeed News that his familys experience was almost certainly happening on a wider scale across the country. Seeing the ministers at their daily briefings spouting things about how much money and equipment theyre promising, and the… [+1983 chars]
